page.title: 18A Day In My Life
page.content: I think that a Tuesday is my favourite day so I am going to write about the normal things I do on Tuesday. I get up at quarter to eight. I get dressed, have my breakfast and go to school at quarter to nine. I start school with assembly, in assembly Mr Cooper tells us the events which are going to happen in the next fortnight. I have one lesson then our morning breaktime. After that I have two more lessons and lunch followed by a break. We have three more lessons then its home time for most people but I stay for chess club which I enjoy very much. I come home and have a small snack. Next comes the best part of the day _ one hour of cricket club. I practise batting and bowling against other boys. I come home and have my dinner.I watch television for a while and then go to bed.
